passive.name: Stance
passive.description: While standing for at least 1 second you receive a 40% defense and 30% damage buff. 20% defense & 15% damage buff while moving.

passive.name: Bleeder
passive.description: Deals 5% of bleed from damage dealt, each bleed tick removes 0.5% of the targets health.

passive.name: Tank
passive.description: 30% more resistant to stun and knockback, 10% more resistant to damage.

passive.name: Runner
passive.description: 50% more resistant to health-related speed reduction

passive.name: Tank
passive.description: 30% more resistant to stun and knockback, 10% more resistant to damage.

passive.name: Frenzy
passive.description: Every combo grants a damage boost of 5%, stacking up to 25%.

passive.name: Bloodthirsty
passive.description: Heals 20% of damage dealt, and provides 35% health regen on kill instead of 20%.

passive.name: Enraged
passive.description: Damage increases as player-health lowers, stacking up to 50%.

passive.name: Pacifist
passive.description: Health regeneration is boosted by 25%.

passive.name: Reaper's Gamble
passive.description: After dealing 3.5k damage without dying, gain a random buff for 2 minutes: +20% damage, +20% damage resistance, or +20% speed. Damage dealt during this time doesn't count toward the next activation.

passive.name: Fear
passive.description: Nearby players in combat suffer a 10% damage reduction for 20 seconds, the debuff refreshes if they stay within range, lasting until they walk away or the scarecrow is destroyed.

passive.name: Poison
passive.description: Inflicts poison when damage is dealt, each poison stack drains 0.3% stamina per second, stacks up to 10.

passive.name: Bloodthirsty
passive.description: Heals 20% of damage dealt, and provides 35% health regen on kill instead of 20%.

passive.name: One Last Chance
passive.description: On death, revive with a roar. Lose 10% health every 1.5 seconds but heal by dealing damage. Deal 25% less damage while active; if health hits zero, you die.
